org.osmdroid.google.wrapper
Class MapView

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.google.wrapper.MapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMapView
public class MapView
extends Object
implements IMapView

A wrapper for the Google MapView class. This implements IMapView, which is also implemented by the osmdroid MapView.

Author:
Neil Boyd
